resources.string: Tap the Birthday cake icon to start adding birthdays!
Show an example notification using current settings
To add a new birthday reminder, tap the birthday cake icon. Then enter the name and date.
Tap the name of the birthday you would like to change. Then click the edit button.
Tap the birthday you would like to change from the list. Then tap delete.
Tap the alarm icon to toggle the alarm reminder.

Open the settings menu, and tap the 'Allow reminder notifications' option.


For more help, to send feedback or suggest a new feature, please send me an email at julianrosser91@gmail.com or tap the mail button!
